meanings.definition: Not engaging in the act of breeding or reproduction.
meanings.sent1: The nonbreeding birds were focused on finding food.
meanings.sent2: The zoo only had nonbreeding animals on display.
meanings.sent3: The nonbreeding rabbits were more interested in playing than mating.
meanings.sent4: The nonbreeding season brought a sense of calm to the wildlife sanctuary.
meanings.sent5: The nonbreeding period allowed the animals to relax and enjoy life.

meanings.definition: Not capable of breeding or reproducing.
meanings.sent1: The nonbreeding pair of dogs were adopted for companionship.
meanings.sent2: The nonbreeding cat was content with lounging in the sun.
meanings.sent3: The nonbreeding hamster had a special talent for escaping its cage.
meanings.sent4: The nonbreeding plants still added beauty to the garden with their colorful leaves.
meanings.sent5: The nonbreeding fish were cherished for their unique patterns and colors.
